name: Paradise Swing
description: Paradise Swing is a VR experience that brings a swing to your living room. Whenever you feel stressed or you just want to relax for a minute, put on the headset, immerse in an intimate atmosphere and swing like a child. There are four levels of intensity, from relax mode to extreme, if you feel confident to do a 360 turn. You can personalize the experience by changing the music, the lights and background, making everything perfect for relaxation. For a full experience, you can try one of the two proposed activities, reading a book or free drawing. These functions are among the most popular activities for relaxation. You can choose between a list of books that will be updated every month or drawing in mid air with different colors.
